summary: An ordinance ratifying and confirming a loan of $1,000,000.00 of a loan of $2,000,000.00 authorized at the general election held in the City of Seattle, on March 8, 1910, under and pursuant to Ordinance No. 22732 directing the issuance and delivery of bonds therefor; providing for the form of such bonds and providing for the payment of the principal and interest thereof.
